CancelQuantumTask.name: CancelQuantumTask
CancelQuantumTask.description: Grants permission to cancel a quantum task.

CreateQuantumTask.name: CreateQuantumTask
CreateQuantumTask.description: Grants permission to create a quantum task.

GetDevice.name: GetDevice
GetDevice.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the devices available in Amazon Braket.

GetQuantumTask.name: GetQuantumTask
GetQuantumTask.description: Grants permission to retrieve quantum tasks.

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Lists the tags that have been applied to the quantum task resource.

SearchDevices.name: SearchDevices
SearchDevices.description: Grants permission to search for devices available in Amazon Braket.

SearchQuantumTasks.name: SearchQuantumTasks
SearchQuantumTasks.description: Grants permission to search for quantum tasks.

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Adds one or more tags to a quantum task.

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description:
Remove one or more tags from a quantum task resource. A tag consists of a key-value
                                                pair
